projectInfo.name: Todo App with Atlas UI
projectInfo.description: A React-based Todo application with TypeScript, Material UI, and Atlas UI components

stateManagement.description: React Context is used for state management

componentStructure.description: Components are organized by feature and follow React functional component pattern with TypeScript interfaces for props

styling.description: Material UI's sx prop is used for styling components

componentPattern.description: Functional components with explicit typing using React.FC<Props> pattern
componentPattern.example: export const ComponentName: React.FC<Props> = ({ prop1, prop2 }) => { ... }

testing.pattern: Component tests using describe/it blocks with React Testing Library

detailedDocumentation: For comprehensive documentation about the project structure, architecture, and development practices, please refer to the AI.md file at the root of the repository.
